All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddressHandler
    Returns the private IP address and port the HTTP server is listening to.
    ByteArrayResponse
    Wraps a byte array into a HttpResponse.
    ClassPathRequestHandler
    Returns binary files accessible on the class path.
    Constants
    Constants that configure the HTTP server.
    DeletePhotoHandler
    Deletes a photo by ID.
    ErrorResponse
    Wraps an Exception into a HttpResponse.
    FileRequestHandler
    Returns binary files accessible on the file system.
    FileResponse
    Wraps file data into a HttpResponse.
    Headers
    Simplified header data storage and processing.
    HttpConnectionHandler
    Handles a HTTP connection from w HTTP client.
    HttpRequest
    Encapsulates a full HTTP request sent from a HTTP client.
    HttpRequestHandler
    Handles a HTTP request and generates a suitable HTTP response.
    HttpResponse
    Encapsulates a full HTTP response to be returned to a HTTP client.
    JsonArrayResponse
    Wraps a JSON array into a HttpResponse.
    Main
    Starts the PhotoFrame software.
    NextPhotoHandler
    Uses the PhotoPicker to return photo filenames that should be displayed.
    NiceLogFormatter
    Formats java.util.logging into something that is useful.
    PhotoFrameServer
    Starts the PhotoFrame HTTP server used to upload photos and control web players.
    PhotoMeta
    Encapsulates photo meta data to aid photo selection.
    PhotoPicker
    Scans a directory of photos and picks photos to be displayed.
    PreviewListHandler  
    RootHandler
    The root handler is responsible for reading a request path and delegating to other handlers.
    SelectPhotoHandler
    Selects a photo by ID to be displayed by the player.
    SimpleHttpServer
    Starts the HTTP listening on a server socket.
    StreamUtil
    Various methods for handling data streams.
    TempRedirectResponse
    Used to aid redirection of HTTP requests.
    TextResponse
    Wraps plain text into a HttpResponse.
    UploadHandler
    Processes a Base64 encoded blob of JPEG data sent from admin interface.
